seo_metadata.title: Rene Linares | Software Engineer & Web Developer
seo_metadata.description: Based in Miami, I'm a Fullstack Developer with experience creating responsive, user-friendly websites, applications and software of all kinds of complexity.

hero_section.title: Rene Linares
hero_section.subtitle: Web Developer
hero_section.description: I am a Fullstack Developer with 3 years of experience in applications and software development. Proficient in both Frontend and Backend, I perfectly understand the entire web product lifecycle. I have experience collaborating with teams on projects for large companies and small businesses.

commercial.title: E-Learning platform for a prestigious bank
commercial.description: A prestigious, high-standard online education platform with more than 500 study programs that allows thousands of specialists to develop professional skills and build a successful career. This is a product financed and sponsored by one of the largest banks in Russia with more than 276 thousand employees. The project is protected by NDA.
details: Development of new features for a “Drag and Drop” course constructor, which includes charts for statistics, automatic report generation, management of homeworks uploaded by students, calendars and events, support chats, management of student access, as well as integration with an AI content generator through a REST API
Migration of UI components from Vue.js to React
Code review for other team members

commercial.title: M2 | Corporate website for an Internet provider
commercial.description: An Internet provider dedicated to delivering high-speed, reliable services to homes and businesses.
details: Setting up the development and production environments of the project from scratch (Docker, Nginx, PM2, etc.)
Frontend development using Server-Side Rendering (SSR) improving the SEO and performance of the website by 30%
Integration with REST API provided by the company for handling user session, making online payments, displaying subscription plans, statistics, etc.
Integration with CMS (Wordpress) through REST API for managing website content. Customization of the Wordpress admin interface

commercial.title: Logist | Corporate website for a transport and logistics company
commercial.description: A company located in Vladivostok, Russia that offers transportation and logistics services at national and international levels.
details: Frontend development using Server-Side Rendering (SSR) significantly improving the SEO and performance of the website
Development of a REST API for the management of transport routes, schedules, etc.
Integration with database MongoDB and management
Integration with CMS (Wordpress) through REST API for the management of website content. Customization of the Wordpress administrator interface

commercial.title: Mir Kvartir | Real estate rental and sales platform
commercial.description: A platform that allows users to search, rent or buy properties in St. Petersburg and its surroundings. It has more than 2 thousand properties available in its catalog.
details: Support for less experienced developers in the creation of UI components
Refactoring and correction of UI components to improve the user experience
Development of a REST API for the management of property catalogs, realtors, etc.
Integration with relational database PostgreSQL and management

commercial.title: Skytechnic | Aircraft maintenance services company
commercial.description: A company that provides aircraft maintenance and repair services at major Moscow airports.
details: Setting up the development and production environments of the project from scratch (Docker, Nginx, PM2, etc.)
Support for less experienced developers in the creation of UI components
Frontend development using Server-Side Rendering (SSR) significantly improving SEO and website performance
Integration with CMS (Wordpress) via REST API for website content management. Customization of Wordpress admin interface

commercial.title: Nasledie | Online biography management service
commercial.description: Promising and innovative online biography management platform that allows users to create and share their life stories, photos, videos and more.
details: Development of new feature (user personal account) for managing biographies, plan payments, etc.
Maintenance of the platform's Frontend. Debugging and bug fixing

personal.title: Go Shortener | URL shortening application
personal.description: A REST API that allows users to shorten long URLs by generating a short alias and redirecting to the original URL.
details: Public endpoints for generating aliases and redirecting to the original URLs
Private endpoints for generating custom URLs and managing existing ones
Implementing the “Clean Architecture” principle
Writing unit and functional tests
Containerizing the application using Docker

personal.title: Mock Shop API | Application for managing an online store
personal.description: A REST API that facilitates the management of products, categories, orders, etc. of an online store.
details: Public endpoints for getting articles and categories
Private endpoints for catalog management (CRUD of products and categories)
Endpoints for the user's personal account (registration, login, password recovery, order management, etc.)
Implementing the “Clean Architecture” principle
Writing unit tests
Writing Swagger documentation
Containerizing the application using Docker

personal.title: Time Master | Task Management App (Frontend)
personal.description: An app that allows users to create, edit, delete, and mark completed to-do tasks.
details: Elastic layout for mobile-friendly design
Integration with REST API for user account management (registration, login, password recovery, task CRUD, etc.)
App deployment in SPA (Single Page App) and PWA (Progressive Web App) mode

personal.title: Time Master | Task Management Application (Backend)
personal.description: An app that allows users to create, edit, delete, and mark completed to-do tasks.
details: Endpoints for user personal account (registration, login, password recovery, task CRUD, etc.)
Connection to an SMTP server to send emails to users for email confirmation and password recovery
Integration with relational database PostgreSQL and management

personal.title: Spyfall | Application to play the game Spyfall
personal.description: Web version of the game Spyfall, in which players must guess the identity of a spy among them.
details: Elastic layout for mobile-oriented design
Creating UI components
Using sessionStorage and localStorage for data persistence
Handling paths and navigation between screens

about_me_section.title: About me
about_me_section.top_text: I am a passionate and skilled Fullstack developer with experience in designing, developing, and implementing robust web applications.

skills_block.text: I am well-versed in the software development lifecycle and have a deep understanding of both Frontend and Backend technologies, including:
skills: Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Vue.js, React
Backend: Go, Node.js, PHP, SQL, NoSQL, gRPC
Tools and technologies: Git, Docker, Shell

about_me_section.bottom_text: I love solving complex problems and challenges in my work. I am results-oriented with a strong ability to learn and adapt to new technologies. I enjoy working in a team environment and creating innovative solutions that meet the needs of businesses and clients.

certificates_section.title: Certificates
certificates_section.text: I strive to constantly improve, which you can see by looking at my certificates. Most of the courses and certificates I obtained from the popular platform

projects_list.title: URL shortening API
details: Endpoints for generating URLs and redirecting;
Private endpoints for generating custom URLs and for deleting them;
Using of the “Clean Architecture” principle;
Writing unit tests;
Writing functional tests;
Containerization of the app using Docker.

projects_list.title: API for an online store
details: Service for user authorization and authentication using JWT;
User password recovery service;
Endpoints for a catalog with products and categories;
Private endpoints for catalog management;
Using of the “Clean Architecture” principle;
Writing unit tests;
Writing Swagger documentation;
Containerization of the app using Docker.

projects_list.title: Blog about IT and online courses
details: Elastic layout design;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Nuxt2 - Options API);
Customization of the Wordpress admin panel using PHP language;
Creating a Backend and API;
Integration with CMS (Wordpress) through API.
(Private repository)

projects_list.title: Web application for tracking daily tasks (Frontend)
details: Elastic layout design oriented towards mobile devices;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Nuxt2 - Options API);
Interacting with Backend through RESTful API;
Managing user account using JWT and localStorage;
Launching the application in SPA (Single Page App) and PWA (Progressive Web App) mode.

projects_list.title: Web application for tracking daily tasks (Backend)
details: Creating and configuring a database on Postgres SQL;
CRUD service for managing data in the database;
Middlewares for filtering requests from the client side and also for authentication and authorization using JWT;
Writing endpoints for RESTful API;
Connecting to an SMTP server for sending emails to users for email confirmation and password recovery.

projects_list.title: Web application analog of the board game “Spyfall”
details: Elastic layout design oriented towards mobile devices;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Vue2 - Options API);
Using sessionStorage and localStorage for data persistence since the app works without a Backend;
Vue-router for navigation.

contacts_section.title: Contacts
contacts_section.description: If you are looking for someone with strong technical skills and a can-do mindset to join your team, please feel free to contact me.
